item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I’m kaka, from Taiwan. ğŸ‘‹ I’m a software engineer at Inventec focusing primarily on the development of Advanced Driver Assistance Systems and related application with Python & C/C++. I received M.S.(2015) in Bio-Industrial Mechatronics Engineering from National Taiwan University (NTU).

item.title: [Python] Ch0: Install Python
item.description: Python Environment Setup Tutorials Medium: Install Python on Windows Windows macOS Ubuntu

item.title: [Python] Ch0: Install Python: Mac
item.description: 1. Install Package Manager Homebrew It is the package manager for macOS. Following the install step on the website to install it. 2. Install Python3 2-1. Homebrew $ brew install python 2-2. Miniconda 1. Download installer $ wget https://repo.anaconda.com/miniconda/Miniconda3-latest-MacOSX-x86_64.sh 2. Install # install miniconda in ~/opt $ mkdir -p ~/opt $ chmod +x Miniconda3-latest-MacOSX-x86_64.sh $ bash Miniconda3-latest-MacOSX-x86_64.sh 3. Activate conda 1. bash Copy conda initialize in ~/.

item.title: [Python] Ch0: Install Python: Ubuntu
item.description: 1. Install request package $ sudo apt-get update && apt-get upgrade $ sudo apt-get install wget vim 2. Install Python3 Miniconda 2-1. Download installer $ wget https://repo.anaconda.com/miniconda/Miniconda3-latest-Linux-x86_64.sh 2-2. Change the access permissions of files $ chmod +x Miniconda3-latest-Linux-x86_64.sh 2-3. Install # install miniconda in ~/opt $ mkdir -p ~/opt $ bash Miniconda3-latest-Linux-x86_64.sh 2-4. Activate conda 1. bash Copy conda initialize in ~/.bash_profile to ~/.bashrc, as below: Activate $ source ~/.

item.title: [Python] Ch0: Install Python: Windows
item.description: 1. Install Package Manager Chocolate It is the package manager for windows. Following the install step on the website to install it. 2. Install More Handy Terminal ConEmu Using choco to install it. > choco install conemu 3. Install Git Bash Git for Window Download and Install it. 4. Open ConEmu Opening ConEmu and choose git bash, then you can use Unix-commands.
Google Trends to Google Data Studion COVID-19 Search Trends in 2020

Data Science Visualization Matplotlib Matplotlib é¡¯ç¤ºä¸­æ–‡ Windows macOS Ubuntu Google Trends Get and Analysis the result of Google Trends with Python Google Trends to Google Data Studio Juputer Notebook JupyterHub

MySQL 1. Install database Ubuntu $ sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get upgrade # install MySQL $ sudo apt install mysql-server $ sudo apt install mysql-client $ sudo apt install libmysqlclient-dev Mac # install MySQL $ brew install openssl $ brew install mysql $ brew install mysql-connector-c 2. Install requirement packages mysql mysqlclient $ pip3 install mysql

Database Learning Notes Database Basics SQL Style Guide Relational database (é—œè¯å¼è³‡æ–™åº«) SQLite MySQL ORM (ç‰©ä»¶é—œè¯å°æ˜ ) SQLAlchemy Install requirement packages jupyter SQLAlchemy ipython-sql $ pip3 install -r requirements.txt
SQLAlchemy SQLAlchemy is the Python SQL toolkit and Object Relational Mapper that gives application developers the full power and flexibility of SQL. SQLAlchemy - Tutorial

SQLite Install database Ubuntu $ sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get upgrade # install SQlite $ sudo apt install sqlite3 # install MySQL $ sudo apt install mysql-server $ sudo apt install mysql-client $ sudo apt install libmysqlclient-dev Mac # install SQLite $ brew install sqlite # install MySQL $ brew install openssl $ brew install mysql $ brew install mysql-connector-c
CI/CD
Docker Compose

Docker Compose Example Build a simple Python web application running on Docker Compose. This application uses the Flask framework and maintains a hit counter in Redis Flask + Redis ç¶²é äººæ•¸çµ±è¨ˆçš„ç¯„ä¾‹ Build and Run $ docker-cpmpose up # run services in background # -d: datached mode $ docker-compose up -d Stop && Remove Container $ docker-compose down # --volumes: remove the data volume
DevOps Learning Notes DevOps = Development + Operations Table of Contents CI/CD GitLab CI/CD Docker Docker Compose
Data Structures and Algorithms, NTU Hsuan-Tien Lin This is my study notes Array

Climbing Stairs (Fibonacci sequence) Wiki: Fibonacci_number leetcode: Climbing Stairs Description You are climbing a stair case. It takes n steps to reach to the top. Each time you can either climb 1 or 2 steps. In how many distinct ways can you climb to the top? Note: Given n will be a positive integer.
